name: DISCONTINUED Light TweetDeck 2.1 Candy
description: I am officially discontinuing all my TweetDeck themes, so they may be outdated, but feel free to fork them (they now are into the public domain)! This style needs to be used with the light theme of TweetDeck, otherwise it will be ugly ! This is a pink version of Light TweetDeck themes.
additional_info: Light TweetDeck family : Light TweetDeck Classic Aero•Aqua Light TweetDeck 2.1 Aero•Aqua•Night•Purple•Laïss•Candy•Fire•Coco Light TweetDeck 3 Aero•Aqua•Night•Purple•Laïss•Candy•Fire•Coco Newspaper Light•Dark
